bs-smwconnector-propertyvalueprovider-us: User pages of the users that have been mentioned on this page
apihelp-bs-smw-connector-ask-store-summa: ExtJS-compatible store to execute semantic queries
apihelp-bs-smw-connector-ask-store-props: Properties to be retrieved. Those properties will correspond to the schema and data returned. Key-value pairs, key is the actual property name, value is desired label (JSON)
bs-smw-connector-async-ask-unknown-handl: Handler for format "$1" is not registered or not valid
apihelp-bs-smw-connector-ask-tree-store-: Node value that will replace <nowiki>{{{node}}}</nowiki> placeholder in the query
